overview: Kitty and Tommy live in South Korea, while Mia and Emma live in Japan. Unable to meet IRL, they connect via video calls, using AR avatars and translation chat apps. Not safe or free in their patriarchal societies, they imagine a different existence online, teleporting into each other's lives and together creating a cyber feminist network that proves imagined realities can womanifest into real representation and change.
title: Teleporting
